text: First-Year Student () is a 1948 Soviet movie directed by Ilya Frez.Биография народной артистки РСФСР Киры ГоловкоПервоклассница (1948) It stars Natalya Zashchipina, Tamara Makarova, and Tatyana Barysheva. == Actors == * Natalya Zashchipina as Marusja (as Natasha Zashchipina) * Tamara Makarova as Teacher * Tatyana Barysheva as Grandmother * Kira GolovkoБиография народной артистки РСФСР Киры Головко * Igor Iroschkin as Serezha * Katya Ivanova as Mother == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1948 movies Category:Movies directed by Ilya Frez
title: First-Year Student
